title: Augusta County: George Schreckhise to James M. Schreckhise, March 5, 1862
summary: Schreckhise writes to his son about news from home, including complaints about religious dissenters who avoid enlisting, although he also encourages his son not to enlist quite yet.
keywords: Enlistment, Agriculture, State Government, Family, Church/Religious Activity, Military Authority, Home Front, American Civil War
